column1: Table 6.3.1: EAU risk categories for biochemical recurrence

column2: PSA-DT > 1 year   AND   pathological ISUP grade < 4
column3: PSA-DT < 1 year   OR   pathological ISUP grade 4–5

column2: interval to biochemical failure > 18 months   AND   biopsy ISUP grade < 4
column3: interval to biochemical failure < 18 months  OR   biopsy ISUP grade 4–5
